alert.note: Alert for Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 6:49PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Flagler and southeastern Putnam Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 649 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Crescent City, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bunnell, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Andalusia, Fruitland, Espanola and Lake Como. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
